summary: A very simple mod that allows you to sprint and roll while you are casting spells.
descriptionHtml:
This a very simple mod (Just 1 edit) that allows you to sprint even while casting spells. NO behavior change, NO FNIS stuff, simply changes ONE condition in the creation kit. Compatible with every mod present except those that change the same record in Creation Kit (and none exist for the moment)
Since the "Silent Roll" count as sprinting, you can also cast spells while rolling.


This will be included in my future magic overhaul but I'm releasing it as a separate file for those who simply want this feature.
author: Mecar
